author: yusaku
msg: AMBARI-1224. Drop the all option from Hosts > Component Filter and Jobs > Users Filter. (yusaku)

author: breser
msg: Fix svntweet.py for the changes to svnpubsub.  Followup to r1432778.
Also uses posixpath instead of os.path to deal with fspaths so it can work on
OS'es that use something other than '/' as the path separator.
(imports): Remove xml.sax as we no longer support xml and pull in posixpath.
Commit object instead of Revision object.

author: yusaku

author: yusaku
msg: AMBARI-1222. DAG, Jobs Timeline, and Tasks graphs UI cleanup. (yusaku)
